title: New Preview of Forthcoming Crewekerne
content: The Crewekerne family has progressed a LOT since we last posted a preview, so we've just published an up to date preview of this forthcoming release on Greater Albion Typefounder's [blog](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015104733/http:/gatf.wordpress.com/). Why not have a look and leave acomment (there or here) to let us know what you think?
author: Rasendyll
